reason: Bad question: asks about '행정 처리 담당자' (administrative processing person) which is not mentioned anywhere in the source. Answer dumps committee composition info without addressing the question.
Vague question ('전체적인 내용을 요약해주세요') + answer is a raw dump of source text with minimal reformatting.
Accurate answer about 위원회의 운영. Source text from page 98 (가)(나) under '2) 위원회의 운영' is correctly reproduced. Question is reasonably specific.
Grammatically broken question (missing closing parenthesis). Source title says '운용세칙' but the text is actually from '위원회의 구성' section (나) on page 98, not the 운용세칙 section.
Vague question ('전체 구조와 내용을 설명해주세요') + raw dump of the entire page 98 spanning multiple sections (운용세칙, 지방교육전문직원 인사위원회, 위원회의 구성, 위원회의 운영).
Duplicate answer: nearly identical content to q_1_1321/q_1_1325/q_1_1326/q_1_1327. Raw dump of page 98 content without meaningful differentiation.
Duplicate answer: nearly identical content to q_1_1321/q_1_1323/q_1_1326/q_1_1327. Raw dump of page 98 content.
Duplicate answer (same content as q_1_1321/q_1_1323/q_1_1325/q_1_1327). Question asks for '주의해야 할 점' (cautions) but answer is a generic raw dump with no specific cautions identified.
Duplicate answer: nearly identical content to q_1_1321/q_1_1323/q_1_1325/q_1_1326. Raw dump of page 98 content regardless of different question framing.
Accurate and specific. Source page 103 confirms 5학급 이하 교감 미배치 규정 and 교감 수업 담당 예외. Answer is well-structured with clear legal basis.
